sqlMap.statement: SELECT ADPTRBZWKGROUPNAME AS "ADPTRBZWKGROUPNAME" , ADPTRMSGPTRNCD AS "ADPTRMSGPTRNCD" , EAIBZWKDSTCD AS "EAIBZWKDSTCD" , ADPTRCD AS "ADPTRCD" , ADPTRMSGDSTCD AS "ADPTRMSGDSTCD" , ADPTRIODSTCD AS "ADPTRIODSTCD" , REFCLSNAME AS "REFCLSNAME" , SNDRCVHMSLOGYN AS "SNDRCVHMSLOGYN" , ADPTRUSEYN AS "ADPTRUSEYN" , SPCFCLUUSEYN AS "SPCFCLUUSEYN" , ADPTRBZWKGROUPDESC AS "ADPTRBZWKGROUPDESC" , OSIDINSTINO AS "OSIDINSTINO" , USEREMPID AS "USEREMPID" FROM $schemaId$.TSEAIAD01 WHERE ADPTRBZWKGROUPNAME = #ADPTRBZWKGROUPNAME#

UPDATE $schemaId$.TSEAIAD01 SET ADPTRBZWKGROUPDESC = #ADPTRBZWKGROUPDESC# , ADPTRMSGDSTCD = #ADPTRMSGDSTCD# , ADPTRMSGPTRNCD = #ADPTRMSGPTRNCD# , EAIBZWKDSTCD = #EAIBZWKDSTCD# , ADPTRCD = #ADPTRCD# , ADPTRUSEYN = #ADPTRUSEYN# , ADPTRIODSTCD = #ADPTRIODSTCD# , REFCLSNAME = #REFCLSNAME# , SNDRCVHMSLOGYN = #SNDRCVHMSLOGYN# , SPCFCLUUSEYN = #SPCFCLUUSEYN# , OSIDINSTINO = #OSIDINSTINO# , USEREMPID = #USEREMPID# , REALTIMEBZWKYN = #REALTIMEBZWKYN# , REALTIMEGROUPNAME = #REALTIMEGROUPNAME# , FILTERCLASS = #FILTERCLASS# , ERROREAISVCNAME = #ERROREAISVCNAME# , ERRORLAYOUTNAME = #ERRORLAYOUTNAME# , ERRORVALUE = #ERRORVALUE# , SESSIONYN = #SESSIONYN# , TARGETADAPTERYN = #TARGETADAPTERYN#
WHERE ADPTRBZWKGROUPNAME = #ADPTRBZWKGROUPNAME#

SELECT ADPTRBZWKGROUPNAME AS "ADPTRBZWKGROUPNAME" , ADPTRBZWKNAME AS "ADPTRBZWKNAME" , EAISEVRINSTNCNAME AS "EAISEVRINSTNCNAME" , LSTNERCLSNAME AS "LSTNERCLSNAME" , TESTCLSNAME AS "TESTCLSNAME" , PRPTYGROUPNAME AS "PRPTYGROUPNAME" , ADPTRDESC AS "ADPTRDESC" FROM $schemaId$.TSEAIAD02 WHERE ADPTRBZWKGROUPNAME = #ADPTRBZWKGROUPNAME# ORDER BY PRPTYGROUPNAME

INSERT INTO $schemaId$.TSEAIAD02 ( ADPTRBZWKGROUPNAME, ADPTRBZWKNAME, EAISEVRINSTNCNAME, LSTNERCLSNAME, TESTCLSNAME, PRPTYGROUPNAME, ADPTRDESC ) VALUES ( #ADPTRBZWKGROUPNAME#, #ADPTRBZWKNAME#, #EAISEVRINSTNCNAME#, #LSTNERCLSNAME#, #TESTCLSNAME#, #PRPTYGROUPNAME#, #ADPTRDESC# )

SELECT ADPTRBZWKGROUPNAME AS "ADPTRBZWKGROUPNAME" , ADPTRBZWKGROUPDESC AS "ADPTRBZWKGROUPDESC" , ADPTRMSGDSTCD AS "ADPTRMSGDSTCD" , ADPTRMSGPTRNCD AS "ADPTRMSGPTRNCD" , EAIBZWKDSTCD AS "EAIBZWKDSTCD" , ADPTRCD AS "ADPTRCD" , ADPTRUSEYN AS "ADPTRUSEYN" , ADPTRIODSTCD AS "ADPTRIODSTCD" , REFCLSNAME AS "REFCLSNAME" , SNDRCVHMSLOGYN AS "SNDRCVHMSLOGYN" , SPCFCLUUSEYN AS "SPCFCLUUSEYN" , OSIDINSTINO AS "OSIDINSTINO" , USEREMPID AS "USEREMPID" , REALTIMEBZWKYN AS "REALTIMEBZWKYN" , REALTIMEGROUPNAME AS "REALTIMEGROUPNAME" , FILTERCLASS AS "FILTERCLASS" , ERROREAISVCNAME AS "ERROREAISVCNAME" , ERRORLAYOUTNAME AS "ERRORLAYOUTNAME" , ERRORVALUE AS "ERRORVALUE" , SESSIONYN AS "SESSIONYN" , TARGETADAPTERYN AS "TARGETADAPTERYN" FROM $schemaId$.TSEAIAD01

SELECT HE01.EAIBZWKDSTCD AS "EAIBZWKDSTCD" , CM01.BZWKDSTICNAME AS "BZWKDSTICNAME" , SUBSTR(HE01.EAISVCNAME,1,3) AS "CHANNEL" FROM $schemaId$.TSEAIHE01 HE01, $schemaId$.TSEAICM01 CM01 WHERE HE01.EAIBZWKDSTCD = CM01.EAIBZWKDSTCD AND HE01.EAIBZWKDSTCD = #eaiBzwkDstcd# GROUP BY HE01.EAIBZWKDSTCD , CM01.BZWKDSTICNAME , SUBSTR(HE01.EAISVCNAME,1,3) ORDER BY HE01.EAIBZWKDSTCD , SUBSTR(HE01.EAISVCNAME,1,3)
SELECT ADPTRBZWKGROUPNAME AS "ADPTRBZWKGROUPNAME", ADPTRBZWKGROUPDESC AS "ADPTRBZWKGROUPDESC" FROM $schemaId$.TSEAIAD01 WHERE ADPTRCD IN ($adptrCdIn$) order by ADPTRBZWKGROUPNAME
